content: For the fourth quarter of 2022, our wholesale fuel gross profit increased 4% to $18.7 million compared to $18 million in the fourth quarter of 2021. Wholesale segment gross profit was $32.8 million, an increase of 6% when compared to the gross profit of $31.1 million for the fourth quarter of 2021. Our wholesale segment generated gross profit of $130.7 million for the full year 2022, a 5% increase over the $124.7 million reported in 2021. The full year of 2022, our retail segment's gross profit increased 61% to $245 million compared to $152.3 million for the full year of 2021. Adjusted EBITDA was $44.3 million for the fourth quarter of 2022, which was an increase of 20% when compared to adjusted EBITDA of $37 million for the fourth quarter of 2021. Adjusted EBITDA was $179.8 million for the full year of 2022 compared to $123.3 million for the full year of 2021, an increase of 46%.
